Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
backpack \back"pack\ n. a bag carried on the back, supported by straps looped over the shoulders.
Syn: knapsack; rucksack; haversack. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: backpack \back"pack\ v. i. to hike while carrying a backpack; -- often used in the form {go backpacking}; as, to backpack through the forest. [PJC]
back pack n : a bag carried by a strap on your back or shoulder [syn: {backpack}, {knapsack}, {packsack}, {rucksack}, {haversack}]

backpack n : a bag carried by a strap on your back or shoulder [syn: {back pack}, {knapsack}, {packsack}, {rucksack}, {haversack}] v : hike with a backpack; "Every summer they are backpacking in the Rockies" [syn: {pack}]
